author: TNN
title: Fearing backlash, Cong leaders divided over Ram temple invite - Times of India
text: KOZHIKODE/KOCHI: The invitation extended to the national leadership of the Congress to attend the consecration of Ram temple in Ayodhya on January 22 has left the party's state unit divided. The outright rejection of the invite by the CPM and CPI and the state BJP leaders' jibe at the Congress to come clear on its stand has further exposed the division.Senior Congress leader and MP K Muraleedharan told reporters in Kozhikode on Thursday that the party state unit had urged the national leadership not to participate in the consecration ceremony, but KPCC president K Sudhakaran maintained that he was not aware of any such development and it was up to the national leadership to take a stand on the matter.Muraleedharan said the BJP was playing politics over the temple inauguration. \"Our stand is that one should not fall into their trap... The consecration of a temple is a religious matter and as head of the government, it is not appropriate for the Prime Minister to inaugurate the temple. It should be done by priests and trustees of the temple,\" he added.The Samastha Kerala Jamiyyathul Ulema had on Wednesday cautioned the Congress party against its leaders attending the consecration ceremony and criticised the party for holding on to its soft-Hindutva stand. The IUML, the second largest party in the UDF, also wanted the Congress to exercise caution in this regard.Sudhakaran told the media in Kannur that the KPCC could not take a stand on the matter. \"If the national leadership seeks the KPCC's opinion, we will convey our stand,\" he said. Asked about Muraleedharan's remarks, he said the question should be posed to Muraleedharan himself.Meanwhile, MP Shashi Tharoor said in Pathanamthitta that attempts were being made to make a political issue out of the invite. “Putting the Congress leadership in a box and saying if you go that means you are playing into the BJP's hands; if you don’t go that means you are anti-Hindu, this kind of thing is nonsense... Let the individuals (who have been invited) make a reasonable choice,” he said. Tharoor said the party would let them know if it took a collective decision. “Right now, three or four individuals have been invited from the party leadership and they will certainly make a decision in an appropriate manner at the appropriate time,” he said. Earlier in the day, Muraleedharan said the national leadership of the party would take a stand at the national level after taking into account the feelings of people. However, he said the Congress party could not take a stand like the CPM or CPI, which belonged to nonbelievers, while the Congress encompassed all sections including believers and non-believers. “The Samajwadi Party, which is leading the INDIA bloc in Uttar Pradesh, which has the highest number of MPs, has said it would attend the event. The Uddhav Thackeray faction of the Shiv Sena is also attending the event. We have to take a decision after considering all aspects,” he said.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo faz história e chega a 900 gols na carreira
text:

Twitter Facebook Youtube Instagram Ao vivo Login Cadastre-se Esporte na Band Futebol Cristiano Ronaldo faz história e chega a 900 gols na carreira Craque português atinge marca nesta quinta-feira com tento marcado por Portugal contra a Croácia pela Liga das Nações da Uefa Da Redação
05/09/2024 • 16:36 • Atualizado em 05/09/2024 • 16:39
Pedro Nunes/Reuters Cristiano Ronaldo fez história nesta quinta-feira (5). O craque português chegou a marca de 900 gols na carreira em jogos oficiais após balançar as redes pela sua seleção contra a Croácia, pela Liga das Nações da Uefa.
Cristiano Ronaldo havia batido na trave na busca pelo gol 900º na última rodada do Campeonato Saudita 2024/25. CR7 chegou a balançar as redes, mas perdeu um gol inacreditável na goleada do Al Nassr por 4 a 1 contra o Al Fayha, na última sexta-feira.
Com 900 gols, Cristiano Ronaldo segue isolado na liderança da artilharia da história do futebol em jogos oficiais. O segundo atleta com mais bolas na rede na lista é Lionel Messi, com 838 tentos. Embora seja o goleador máximo do esporte considerando todas as partidas disputadas, Pelé o quinto do ranking, com 767.
Melhores momentos: Al Fayha 1x4 Al Nassr: Veja a lista dos maiores artilheiros da história do futebol em jogos oficiais: Cristiano Ronaldo - 899 gols Lionel Messi - 838 gols Josef Bican - 805 gols Romário - 772 gols Pelé - 767 gols Ferenc Puskás - 746 gols Gerd Müller - 735 gols Robert Lewandowski - 670 gols Eusébio - 623 gols Luis Suárez - 576 gols Zlatan Ibrahimovic - 573 gols Ferenc Deak - 546 gols Túlio Maravilha - 545 gols Veja também

author: djy
title: 库存高达1160亿元 比亚迪开启限时降价模式
text:
【大纪元2025年05月08日讯】（大纪元记者李净综合报导）近年来，中国汽车市场竞争愈发激烈，车企库存压力持续攀升。根据年报显示，比亚迪去年库存高达1,160.36亿元人民币，位居行业之首。高存货意味着企业大量资金被锁定在未销售产品上，影响企业资金流动性，增加财务成本，甚至在产品更新迅速的汽车行业中带来贬值的风险。
面对新车上市带来的竞争压力，中国多家车企纷纷采取“一口价”策略进行库存清理。作为新能源汽车领军企业的比亚迪，在其推出“全民智驾”战略后，多款非智驾车型不得不开启“清库存”模式，以应对日益激烈的市场竞争。
近日，比亚迪旗下的王朝网和海洋网共有10款非智驾车型官宣限时降价，降幅约1万元（人民币，下同），最低起售价甚至进入5万元区间。
不仅是紧凑型车型，就连中高端车型如汉DM-i和唐DM-i的非智驾版也宣布限时降价，起售价均下调1万元。此外，MPV车型比亚迪“夏”更是提供最高4.2万元的置换补贴，起售价降至20万元区间。
实际上，比亚迪面临的库存压力不仅来自战略转型，更体现在其财务报表中。
根据2024年年报显示，比亚迪以1,160.36亿元的存货规模位居行业首位，远超上汽集团的772.77亿元，以及长城汽车、吉利汽车和长安汽车等超百亿的存货水平。
在存货周转天数方面，比亚迪的存货周转天数为58.57天，海马汽车则以149.96天的周转天数高居榜首，显示其库存变现速度缓慢。
高库存已成为中国车企面临的重大挑战。比亚迪近期集中推出21款智驾车型，意在提前占领中低价位智能驾驶市场。然而随着众多企业跟进智能化战略，大量新车扎堆上市，非智驾老款车型被边缘化，形成进一步的库存积压。
更大的背景是中国整体经济增速放缓，居民消费信心不足，消费倾向趋于保守，车企间的内卷现象日益严重。价格战成为常态，利润空间被不断压缩，不少车企甚至被迫以亏损方式出售车辆，以求换取市场份额和现金流。
责任编辑：郑浩宇#

author: PTI
title: BJP to project Modi as Hindu Hriday Samrat in LS polls: Shashi Tharoor
text:
New Delhi: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) is set to contest the 2024 Lok Sabha polls on the issue of Hindutva by projecting Prime Minister Narendra Modi as the 'Hindu Hriday Samrat', Congress leader Shashi Tharoor said on Friday.
In a post on X, Tharoor noted that Modi is set to inaugurate the Ram temple in Ayodhya on January 22 and the BAPS Hindu Temple in Abu Dhabi on February 14, following which the general election would be announced.
The Congress MP from Thiruvananthapuram said the Lok Sabha election is shaping up to be a Hindutva versus popular welfare battle, and questions on economic growth, creating two crore jobs a year and putting disposable income into the pockets of every Indian need to be debated.
So Prime Minister @NarendraModi will inaugurate the Ram Mandir in Ayodhya on January 22nd and the BAPS Hindu Temple in Abu Dhabi on February 14th. I expect elections to be called very soon thereafter.
The message is clear. In 2009, Mr Modi was sold to the Indian electorate as…
— Shashi Tharoor (@ShashiTharoor) December 29, 2023 "The message is clear. In 2009, Mr Modi was sold to the Indian electorate as the avatar of economic development, the CEO of Gujarat Inc., who would bring development to all Indians. In 2019, with that narrative collapsing in the wake of the disastrous demonetisation, the Pulwama terrorist attack gave Mr Modi the opportunity to convert the general election into a national security election," Tharoor said.
"In 2024, it is clear the BJP will now revert to its core message and offer Narendra Modi to the nation as a Hindu Hriday Samrat," he added.
'Hindu Hriday Samrat' literally translates to the emperor of Hindu hearts.
"All of this begs the question: what happened to achhe din? What happened to two crore jobs a year? What happened to economic growth that would benefit the lower rungs of the socio-economic ladder? What happened to putting disposable income into the pockets and bank accounts of every Indian?" the Congress leader asked.
"These questions will have to be debated in an election that is shaping up to be Hindutva versus popular welfare," the former Union minister said.
ADVERTISEMENT (Published 29 December 2023, 11:12 IST)
